title: 为什么我的pocket mine-MP,开服时发生错误
author: Novise
txt_content:
内容如下:
[PocketMine] Server is starting...
[PocketMine] Server was started.
[Server] 01:36:52 [WARNING] Timezone could not be automatically determined. An incorrect timezone will result in incorrect timestamps on console logs. It has been set to "UTC" by default. You can change it on the php.ini file.
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] Starting Minecraft: PE server version v0.10.5 alpha
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] Loading pocketmine-soft.yml...
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] Loading pocketmine.yml...
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] Loading server properties...
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] Advanced cache enabled
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] Starting Minecraft PE server on 0.0.0.0:19132
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] This server is running PocketMine-Soft version 1.4.1dev-239 "絶好(Zekkou)ケーキ(Cake)" (API 1.11.0)
[Server] 01:36:52 [INFO] PocketMine-Soft is distributed under the LGPL License
[Server] 01:36:52 [CRITICAL] **** FAILED TO BIND TO 0.0.0.0:19132!
[Server] 01:36:52 [CRITICAL] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
[Server] 01:36:52 [EMERGENCY] [RakLib Thread #1078750504] RakLib crashed!
[Server] 01:36:58 [NOTICE] Level "world" not found
[Server] 01:36:58 [INFO] Preparing level "world"
[Server] 01:36:58 [NOTICE] Spawn terrain for level "world" is being generated in the background
[Server] 01:36:58 [INFO] Starting GS4 status listener
[Server] 01:36:58 [INFO] Setting query port to 19132
[Server] 01:36:58 [INFO] Query running on 0.0.0.0:19132
[Server] 01:36:58 [INFO] Default game type: CREATIVE
[Server] 01:36:58 [INFO] Done (12.487s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
[Server] 01:36:58 [ERROR] RuntimeException: "RakLib Thread crashed [raklib\server\UDPServerSocket]: socket_bind(): unable to bind address [98]: Address in use" (E_ERROR) in "/src/raklib/server/UDPServerSocket" at line 32
[Server] 01:36:58 [EMERGENCY] An unrecoverable error has occurred and the server has crashed. Creating a crash dump
[Server] 01:36:58 [EMERGENCY] Please submit the "/mnt/sdcard/PocketMine/CrashDump_Wed_Feb_25-01.36.58-UTC_2015.log" file to the Bug Reporting page. Give as much info as you can.
[Server] 01:37:04 [INFO] Unloading level "world"

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
* 地区时间错误，请设定你所在的地区
* 端口错误，请换端口
* RakLib瘫痪，换个RakLib

replies.author: Aston_Alexander
replies.txt_content:
你的pocketmine文件夹里面应该有一个错误报告
根据你贴出的信息，错误报告的位置是/mnt/sdcard/PocketMine/CrashDump_Wed_Feb_25-01.36.58-UTC_2015.log
把里面的内容复制出来，告诉我
因为之前的程序没有完全退出，把电脑重启一遍就好...

replies.author: a4501150
replies.txt_content:
FAILED TO BIND TO 0.0.0.0:19132!


19132端口被占用 重启服务器或者检查哪个程序在占用那个端口或修改服务器监听端口

replies.author: tdiant
replies.txt_content:
你得把端口换成不是 19132的端口，但这个数字不能大于 25565
楼上说的地区只是个温馨提示，不影响开服
然后检查一下主要的文件是不是有问题，我怀疑bin文件夹有文件缺失的情况发生了
